mapper.update: update blog b set b.views=b.views+1 where id=#{blogId}
mapper.select: select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.views,b.update_time,b.type_id,b.user_id,b.description , t.name as type_name,u.avatar as user_avatar,u.nickname from blog b,type t,user u where b.type_id=t.id and b.user_id=u.id order by views desc

select b.id,b.title,b.first_picture,b.views,b.update_time,b.type_id,b.user_id,b.description , t.name as type_name,u.avatar as user_avatar,u.nickname from blog b,type t,user u where b.type_id=t.id and b.user_id=u.id and b.type_id=#{typeId}

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.first_picture, b.views, b.update_time, b.type_id, b.user_id, b.description, t.name AS type_name, u.avatar AS user_avatar, u.nickname FROM blog b, type t, user u WHERE b.type_id = t.id AND b.user_id = u.id AND b.tag_ids like CONCAT('%',#{tagId},'%')
select count(id) as nums from blog where published=1
select DISTINCT DATE_FORMAT(create_time,"%Y") as year from blog ORDER BY year desc
select id,title,flag, DATE_FORMAT(create_time,"%b %d") as date ,description from blog where published=1 and DATE_FORMAT(create_time,"%Y") =#{year} order by date desc
select type_id from blog where id=#{blogId} limit 1
